00020 #define cardinality_of(Array) (sizeof (Array) / sizeof (*(Array)))
00021 
00022 GD_CATEGORY(UValue);
00023 
00024 namespace urbi
00025 {
00026 
00027   /*---------------.
00028   | USoundFormat.  |
00029   `---------------*/
00030 
00031   static const char* formats[] =
00032   {
00033     "raw",
00034     "wav",
00035     "mp3",
00036     "ogg",
00037     "unknown format",
00038   };
00039 
00040   const char*
00041   format_string(USoundFormat f)
00042   {
00043     if (f < 0 || int(cardinality_of(formats)) <= f)
00044     {
00045       GD_FERROR("invalid USoundFormat value: %d", f);
00046       f = SOUND_UNKNOWN;
00047     }
00048     return formats[f];
00049   }
00050 
00051   USoundFormat
00052   parse_sound_format(const std::string& s)
00053   {
00054     for (unsigned i = 0; i < cardinality_of(formats); ++i)
00055       if (s == formats[i])
00056         return static_cast<USoundFormat>(i);
00057     return SOUND_UNKNOWN;
00058   }
00059 
00060 
00061   /*---------------------.
00062   | USoundSampleFormat.  |
00063   `---------------------*/
00064 
00065   std::istream&
00066   operator>> (std::istream& is, USoundSampleFormat& f)
00067   {
00068     int v = 0;
00069     is >> v;
00070     f = USoundSampleFormat(v);
00071     return is;
00072   }
00073 
00074   std::ostream&
00075   operator<<(std::ostream& o, USoundSampleFormat f)
00076   {
00077     switch (f)
00078     {
00079     case SAMPLE_SIGNED:
00080       return o << "signed";
00081     case SAMPLE_UNSIGNED:
00082       return o << "unsigned";
00083     default:
00084       return o << "unknown[" << (int)f << "]";
00085     }
00086     unreachable();
00087   }

00090   /*---------.
00091   | USound.  |
00092   `---------*/
00093 
00094   USound
00095   USound::make()
00096   {
00097     USound res;
00098     res.data = 0;
00099     res.size = res.sampleSize = res.channels = res.rate = 0;
00100     res.soundFormat = SOUND_UNKNOWN;
00101     res.sampleFormat = SAMPLE_UNSIGNED;
00102     return res;
00103   }
00104 
00105   bool
00106   USound::operator==(const USound &b) const
00107   {
00108     return !memcmp(this, &b, sizeof(USound));
00109   }
00110 
00111   const char*
00112   USound::format_string() const
00113   {
00114     return ::urbi::format_string(soundFormat);
00115   }
00116 
00117   std::string
00118   USound::headers_() const
00119   {
00120     return libport::format("%s %s %s %s %d",
00121                            format_string(),
00122                            channels, rate,
00123                            sampleSize, int(sampleFormat));
00124   }
00125 
00126   std::ostream&
00127   USound::dump(std::ostream& o) const
00128   {
00129     return o << "sound(format: " << format_string() << ", "
00130              << "size: " << size << ", "
00131              << "channels: " << channels << ", "
00132              << "rate: " << rate << ", "
00133              << "sample size: " << sampleSize << ", "
00134              << "sample format: " << sampleFormat
00135              << ")";
00136   }
00137 
00138   std::ostream&
00139   operator<< (std::ostream& o, const USound& s)
00140   {
00141     return s.dump(o);
00142   }
